########################
#Listen 80
Listen 8080

# Load Extra Apache modules ( If you are installing any module please add here. do not edit httpd.conf.)#
#########################################################################################################

# LoadModule proxy_ajp_module modules/mod_proxy_ajp.so
# LoadModule proxy_module modules/mod_proxy.so
##  Rpaf module #######
#LoadModule rpaf_module        modules/mod_rpaf-2.0.so
#RPAFenable On
#RPAFsethostname On
#RPAFproxy_ips 127.0.0.1
#RPAFheader X-Real-IP
###############################################################
LoadModule             remoteip_module "modules/mod_remoteip.so"
#RemoteIPHeader        X-Forwarded-For
RemoteIPHeader       X-Real-IP
#RemoteIPHeader      X-Real-ADDR
# RemoteIPInternalProxy  127.0.0.1
# RemoteIPProxiesHeader  X-Forwarded-For

Include /usr/local/apache/conf/apache-geoip.conf

# Default Virtual Host syntex, Do not add port here.#
#####################################################

#ServerName api.99acres.com
#ServerAlias api.99acres.com
#ServerAdmin webmaster@99acres.com

Include /usr/local/apache/conf/modrewrite-securityrule.conf

RewriteEngine on
RewriteRule .yml /will-go-to-404/ [L]


#<Directory ~ "/*/cache/*|/*/logs/*|/*/temp/|/*/log/|/*/uploads/*|/*/uploadresume/">
<Directory ~ "/*/cache/|/*/logs/|/*/temp/|/*/log/|/*/uploads/|/*/uploadresume/|/*/tmp/">
            # Important for security, prevents someone from
            # uploading a malicious .htaccess
            AllowOverride None
            SetHandler none
            SetHandler default-handler
            Options -ExecCGI
            php_flag engine off
            RemoveHandler .cgi .php .php3 .php4 .php5 .phtml .pl .py .pyc .pyo .inc
            <Files *>
                    SetHandler none
                    SetHandler default-handler
                    Options -ExecCGI
                    php_flag engine off
                    RemoveHandler .cgi .php .php3 .php4 .php5 .phtml .pl .py .pyc .pyo .inc
            </Files>
    </Directory>
######################################################################
#SetEnvIf X-Forwarded-Proto "^https$" HTTPS=on
#SetEnvIf X-Forwarded-Proto "^https$" REQUEST_SCHEME=https
######################################################################
RewriteRule ^/akamai/(.*) /usr/local/apache/htdocs/akamai/$1      [L]

</Directory>

<Directory  /web/jobs.naukri.com/manager/web>
ExpiresActive On
ExpiresByType  image/gif A2592000
ExpiresByType  image/jpeg A2592000
ExpiresByType   application/x-javascript A1296000
ExpiresByType   text/javascript A1296000
</Directory>

<LocationMatch "/favicon.ico">
FileETag None
Header set Cache-Control "max-age=2592000, public, must-revalidate"
</LocationMatch>

</Directory>

     RewriteOptions Inherit

    RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v1/sociallogin(.*) /loginapi/sociallogin$1 [QSA,PT,L]

    RewriteRule ^/mnj/delete?(.*) https://www.naukri.com/mnjuser/settings/communication [L,R=301]

    RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v2/login(.*) /loginapi/loginOTP$1 [QSA,PT,L]
    RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v1/login(.*) /loginapi/login$1 [QSA,PT,L]
    RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v1/forgotPassword(.*) /loginapi/forgotPassword$1 [QSA,PT,L]
    RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v1/resetPassword(.*) /loginapi/resetPassword$1 [QSA,PT,L]

     RewriteRule (.*)/favicon.ico /favicon.ico     [QSA,PT,L]
     RewriteRule ^/googlee3082d93435e480c.html  /nLogin/googlee3082d93435e480c.html [QSA,PT,L]
     RewriteRule ^/mnjapi/v1/changePassword(.*) /loginapi/changePassword$1 [QSA,PT,L]

RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v2/changePassword(.*) /loginapi/changePasswordNew$1 [QSA,PT,L]
RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v1/loginStatus(.*)  /loginapi/loginStatus$1 [QSA,PT,L]
RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v2/resetPassword(.*) /loginapi/resetPasswordNew$1 [QSA,PT,L]
RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v1/logout(.*) /loginapi/logout$1 [QSA,PT,L]
RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v2/sociallogin(.*) /loginapi/socialloginNew$1 [QSA,PT,L]
RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v3/sociallogin(.*) /loginapi/socialloginAuth$1 [QSA,PT,L]
RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v4/sociallogin(.*) /loginapi/socialloginv4$1 [QSA,PT,L]
RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v5/sociallogin(.*) /loginapi/socialloginv5$1 [QSA,PT,L]
RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v2/registerP0(.*) /loginapi/registerP0New$1 [QSA,PT,L]
RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v4/login(.*) /loginapi/desktopLogin$1 [QSA,PT,L]
RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v5/login(.*) /loginapi/desktopLoginNew$1 [QSA,PT,L] 
RewriteRule ^/loginapi/v1/autologin(.*) /loginapi/autologin$1 [QSA,PT,L]
     ErrorDocument 404 https://login.naukri.com/nLogin/Login.php
     ErrorDocument 403 https://login.naukri.com/nLogin/Login.php
     ErrorDocument 400 /ServerErrors/index.php?code=400
     ErrorDocument 401 /ServerErrors/index.php?code=401
     ErrorDocument 403 /ServerErrors/index.php?code=403
     ErrorDocument 404 /ServerErrors/index.php?code=404
     ErrorDocument 500 /ServerErrors/index.php?code=500
     ErrorDocument 503 /ServerErrors/index.php?code=503
     Alias /ServerErrors "/usr/local/apache/htdocs/ServerErrors"
     Alias /favicon.ico "/usr/local/apache/htdocs/favicon.ico"
     Alias /nLogin/ "/web/login.naukri.com/nLogin/web/"
     Alias /loginapi/ "/web/login.naukri.com/nLogin/web/index.php/"
     #Alias /mnj/delete "/apps/MyNaukriRevamp/current/web/resume.php/DelAcc/delete"
     #Alias /mnj/deleteAccount "/apps/MyNaukriRevamp/current/web/resume.php/DelAcc/deleteAccount"
RewriteRule (^$|^/$)  https://login.naukri.com/nLogin/Login.php [R=301,L]
CustomLog "|/usr/local/apache-live/bin/rotatelogs -l /usr/local/apache/logs/login.naukri.com_access_log.%Y%m%d 86400" combinedakamaigeoip
 ErrorLog "|/usr/local/apache-live/bin/rotatelogs -l /usr/local/apache/logs/login.naukri.com_error_log.%Y%m%d 86400"
</VirtualHost>

     ServerAdmin alert.nocks@naukri.com
     DocumentRoot /web/login.naukri.com/nLogin/web/
     ServerName loginjs.resdex.com
<Directory ~ "/web/login.naukri.com/nLogin/web/|/usr/local/apache/htdocs/favicon.ico">
Require all granted
</Directory>
Include /usr/local/apache/conf/modrewrite-securityrule.conf
Include /usr/local/apache/conf/apache-geoip.conf
     RewriteEngine on
     RewriteOptions Inherit
     RewriteRule (.*)/favicon.ico /favicon.ico     [QSA,PT,L]
     ErrorDocument 404 https://login.naukri.com/nLogin/Login.php
     ErrorDocument 403 https://login.naukri.com/nLogin/Login.php
     Alias /favicon.ico "/usr/local/apache/htdocs/favicon.ico"
     Alias /nLogin/ "/web/login.naukri.com/nLogin/web/"

<VirtualHost *>
    ServerAdmin alert.nocks@naukri.com
    DocumentRoot /apps/mobile.naukri.com
    ServerName m.naukri.com
    ServerAlias mob98.naukri.com mob99.naukri.com
<Directory ~ "/apps/mobile.naukri.com/|/apps/mobileweb/current/">
Require all granted
</Directory>
<Location ~ "/login/submit|/login/jsonp">
#php_value open_basedir none
</Location>
     Include /usr/local/apache/conf/modrewrite-securityrule.conf
     Include /usr/local/apache/conf/apache-geoip.conf
    RewriteEngine On
    RewriteOptions Inherit
    RewriteRule ^/favicon.ico /favicon.ico [PT,L]
    RewriteRule ^/ga.php /ga.php [PT,L]
    RewriteRule ^/robots.txt /robots.txt [PT,L]
    RewriteRule ^/akamai/(.*)  /akamai/akamai-test-object.html [PT,L]
    RewriteRule ^/applyHistory(.*) https://apply.naukri.com/apply/historypage   [QSA,L,R=301]
    RewriteRule ^/applyapi/v1/applyByJobId(.*) /mobileapi/applyByJobId$1 [QSA,PT,L]
    RewriteRule ^/applyapi/v1/rmjApply(.*) /mobileapi/rmjApply$1 [QSA,PT,L]
    RewriteRule (^$|^/$)  https://www.naukri.com [R=301,L]
    RewriteRule ^/(.*) /mobileweb/index.php/$1 [PT,L]

    Alias /mobileweb/ "/apps/mobileweb/current/"
    Alias /mobileapi/ "/apps/mobile.naukri.com/MobileAPI/mobileapi.php/"

CustomLog "|/usr/local/apache-live/bin/rotatelogs -l /usr/local/apache/logs/m.naukri.com_access_log.%Y%m%d 86400" combinedakamaigeoip

</VirtualHost>

    ServerAdmin alert.nocks@naukri.com
    DocumentRoot /apps/MobileAPI/current/web
    ServerName mobile.naukri.com
    ServerAlias mobile198.naukri.com mobile199.naukri.com mobile197.naukri.com mobile.services.resdex.com

        Require all granted
</Directory>
php_admin_flag allow_url_fopen off
   php_flag allow_url_include off
#php_value open_basedir "/usr/local/php-live/lib/php/:/tmp/:/apps/MobileAPI/:/apps/mobile.naukri.com/:/apps/old_mobile/:/var/log/:/usr/local/apache-live/htdocs/ServerErrors/:/data/mobileweb/:/data/MobileAPILog/:/usr/local/apache/htdocs/infoscan/:/apps/CentralConfig/:/data/apps:/apps/"

    Include /usr/local/apache/conf/apache-geoip.conf
RewriteEngine On
RewriteOptions Inherit
    RewriteRule ^/favicon.ico /favicon.ico [QSA,PT,L]
    RewriteRule ^/mobVerify/(.*) /mobVerify/$1      [QSA,PT,L]
    RewriteRule ^/response/(.*) /response/$1      [QSA,PT,L]
    RewriteRule ^/MobileAPI/(.*) /MobileAPI/$1      [QSA,PT,L]
    Alias /nLogin/ "/web/login.naukri.com/nLogin/web/"
    Alias /mobVerify/ "/apps/old_mobile/current/mobVerify/web/"
    Alias /response/ "/apps/old_mobile/current/response/web/"
    Alias /MobileAPI/ "/apps/MobileAPI/current/web/"
    Alias /favicon.ico "/usr/local/apache/htdocs/favicon.ico"
CustomLog "|/usr/local/apache-live/bin/rotatelogs -l /usr/local/apache/logs/mobile_new.naukri.com_access_log.%Y%m%d 86400" combinedakamaigeoip
ErrorLog "|/usr/local/apache-live/bin/rotatelogs -l /usr/local/apache/logs/mobile_new.naukri.com_error_log.%Y%m%d 86400"
</VirtualHost>

<VirtualHost *>
     ServerAdmin alert.nocks@naukri.com
     DocumentRoot /apps/resumeUploads_email/
     ServerName resumeupload.my.resdex.com
    <Directory ~ "/apps/resumeUploads_email">
                    SetHandler none
                    SetHandler default-handler
                    Options -ExecCGI
                    php_flag engine off
                    RemoveHandler .cgi .php .php3 .php4 .php5 .phtml .pl .py .pyc .pyo .inc
                    Require all granted
    </Directory>
Include /usr/local/apache/conf/modrewrite-securityrule.conf
Include /usr/local/apache/conf/apache-geoip.conf
#php_value open_basedir "/usr/local/php-live/lib/:/usr/local/symfony-1.4.6/:/tmp/:/apps/MyNaukriRevamp/:/apps/manager/:/apps/FAQ/:/apps/MyNaukriAPI/:/apps/MobileAPI/:/web/jobs.naukri.com/:/var/log/:/usr/local/apache-live/htdocs/ServerErrors/:/apps/nLogin/:/data/apps/bms_zedo/:/data/mobileweb/:/data/MobileAPILog/:/usr/local/apache/htdocs/infoscan/:/apps/mobileweb/:/apps/mobile.naukri.com/:/data/apps:/apps/"

     ErrorLog "|/usr/local/apache-live/bin/rotatelogs -l /usr/local/apache/logs/resumeupload.my.resdex.com_error_log.%Y%m%d 86400"
